Loss before income taxes: Y37.7bn.  Net loss1: Y100.4bn. EPS2:  -Y29.92. 
Dividend per share: Year-end Y3; Annual Y6.

Ð   Three segment performance declined significantly YoY due to lower client activity and challenges in emerging markets and the credit market
Ð   Business momentum slowed in both Wholesale and Retail on the back of market uncertainties
Ð   Wholesale booked goodwill impairment charge (Y81bn) and one-off expenses related to revision of business portfolio
Ð   Outside the three segment performance also impacted by legal expenses related to legacy transactions and an unrealized loss on securities due to bearish market
Income before income taxes: Y24.4bn. Net Income1: Y0.8bn. EPS2: Y0.23.

Firmwide performance improved QoQ but remained muted
Ð Three segment performance turned positive due to the non-recurrence of goodwill impairment charge (Y81bn) attributable to Wholesale booked last quarter and improvement in gain/loss related to American Century Investments
Ð Results outside the three business segments improved on increased gains from affiliated companies and an unrealized gain on securities held due to stock market rally
Ð Booked one-off expenses (Y10.3bn) related to revision of business portfolio and legal expenses (approx. Y12bn) related to legacy transactions

Clients remained in wait-and-see mode; Total sales sluggish due to lower market volumes
Ð Contained expenses but not enough to offset lower revenues leading to QoQ decline in income
before income taxes

Ð Booked inflows for 11th straight quarter, which combined with market factors to lift assets under
management
Ð Gain/loss related to American Century Investments improved, contributing to higher net revenue and
income before income taxes QoQ

Ð Net revenue up QoQ driven by Fixed Income and Investment Banking
Ð Despite absence of goodwill impairment charge (Y81.0bn) booked last quarter, Wholesale booked a
loss before income taxes partially due to one-off expenses (Y8.4bn) related to revision of business portfolio
EPS was -29.92 yen. The YoY change was -25%.
